00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_FIVECOMB_H
00012 #define TT_FIVECOMB_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 #include "tt_comb.h"
00017 #include "tt_crossfade.h"
00018 #include "tt_mixer_mono.h"
00019 #include "tt_gain.h"
00020 #include "tt_audio_signal.h"
00021 
00022 /********************************************************
00023         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00024 
00025         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00026  ********************************************************/
00027 
00028 class tt_fivecomb:public tt_audio_base{
00029 
00030         private:
00031                 enum constants{
00032                         k_num_temp_signals = 7,
00033                 };
00034 
00035                 tt_comb                         *comb_filter[5];                        // main filters
00036                 tt_crossfade            *wetdry_xfader;                         // does the wet-dry mix
00037                 tt_mixer_mono           *mixer;                                         // sums the 5 combs
00038                 tt_gain                         *input_gainer;                          // scales the input signal      
00039                 tt_audio_signal         *temp[k_num_temp_signals];      // Temp Signals
00040                         
00041                 tt_attribute_value      attr_frequency[5];
00042                 tt_attribute_value      attr_frequency_scale;
00043                 tt_attribute_value      attr_resonance[5];
00044                 tt_attribute_value      attr_resonance_scale;
00045                 tt_attribute_value      attr_lowpass_cf[5];
00046                 tt_attribute_value      attr_lowpass_cf_scale;
00047                         
00048         public:
00049                 enum selectors{                                 // Attribute Selectors
00050                         k_frequency,
00051                         k_resonance,
00052                         k_lowpass_cf,
00053                         k_frequency_scale,
00054                         k_resonance_scale,
00055                         k_lowpass_cf_scale,
00056                         k_mix,
00057                         k_input_gain,
00058                 };
00059                 
00060 
00061                 // OBJECT LIFE ************************************************************
00062                 tt_fivecomb()                                                                           // Constructor          
00063                 {
00064                         short i;
00065 
00066                         for(i=0; i<5; i++){
00067                                 comb_filter[i] = new tt_comb(200);
00068                         }
00069                         wetdry_xfader = new tt_crossfade;
00070                         mixer = new tt_mixer_mono;
00071                         input_gainer = new tt_gain;
00072                         
00073                         for(i=0; i < k_num_temp_signals; i++)                   // allocate temp signals
00074                                 temp[i] = new tt_audio_signal(vectorsize);
00075 
00076                         // Default Settings
00077                         // set_attr(k_ratio, 1.0);
00078                         // set_attr(k_windowsize, 87.0);
00079                 }
00080 
00081                 ~tt_fivecomb()                                                                  // Destructor
00082                 {
00083                         short i;
00084                         for(i=0; i<5; i++)
00085                                 delete comb_filter[i];
00086                         delete wetdry_xfader;
00087                         delete mixer;
00088                         delete input_gainer;
00089         
00090                         // FREE THE TEMP SIGNALS
00091                         for(i=0; i<k_num_temp_signals; i++)
00092                                 delete temp[i];
00093                 }
00094 
00095 
00096                 // ATTRIBUTES ************************************************************
00097                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00098                 {
00099                         switch(sel){
00100                                 case k_mix:
00101                                         wetdry_xfader->set_attr(tt_crossfade::k_position, val * 0.01);
00102                                         break;
00103                                 case k_input_gain:
00104                                         input_gainer->set_attr(tt_gain::k_gain, val);
00105                                         break;
00106                                 case k_frequency_scale:
00107                                         break;
00108                                 case k_resonance_scale:
00109                                         break;
00110                                 case k_lowpass_cf_scale:
00111                                         break;
00112                         }
00113                 }
00114                 
00115                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, short index, tt_attribute_value val)
00116                 {
00117                         switch(sel){
00118                                 case k_frequency:
00119                                         break;
00120                                 case k_resonance:
00121                                         break;
00122                                 case k_lowpass_cf:
00123                                         break;
00124                         }
00125                         //index;
00126                         //val;
00127                 }
00128 
00129 
00130                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00131                 {
00132                         switch(sel){
00133                                 case k_mix:
00134                                         return(wetdry_xfader->get_attr(tt_crossfade::k_position) * 100.0);
00135                                 case k_input_gain:
00136                                         return input_gainer->get_attr(tt_gain::k_gain);
00137                                 default:
00138                                         return -1;
00139                         }
00140                 }
00141                 
00142                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel, short index)
00143                 {
00144                         switch(sel){
00145                                 case k_frequency:
00146                                         break;
00147                                 case k_resonance:
00148                                         break;
00149                                 case k_lowpass_cf:
00150                                         break;
00151                                 default:
00152                                         return -1;
00153                         }
00154                         return -1;
00155                         //index;
00156                 }
00157                 
00158                 
00159                 /*****************************************************
00160                  * DSP LOOPS
00161                  *****************************************************/
00162                 // Because this is a meta-object, it is the user of this object who is responsible for making sure that
00163                 //      the vectorsize of the signals are the same as that of this object.
00164 
00165                 // Publically exposed interface for this object's dsp routine
00166                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00167                 {
00168                         input_gainer->dsp_vector_calc(in, temp[0]);                             // Scale input  
00169                         comb_filter[0]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[1]);              // 5 parallel comb filters...
00170                         comb_filter[1]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[2]);
00171                         comb_filter[2]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[3]);
00172                         comb_filter[3]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[4]);
00173                         comb_filter[4]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[5]);
00174                         mixer->dsp_vector_calc(temp[1], temp[2], temp[3], temp[4], temp[5], temp[6]);   // Mixer
00175                         wetdry_xfader->dsp_vector_calc(in, temp[6], out);               // Wet/Dry Mix
00176                 }
00177 
00178 
00179 
00180         public:
00181                 // ADDITIONAL METHODS ************************************************************
00182 
00183                 // clear the filters
00184                 void clear()
00185                 {
00186                         short i;
00187                         for(i=0; i<5; i++)
00188                                 comb_filter[i]->clear();
00189                 }
00190 
00191                 // set sample-rate (override the inherited method)
00192                 void set_sr(int value)
00193                 {
00194                         if(value != sr){
00195                                 short i;
00196                                 
00197                                 sr = value;
00198                                 r_sr = 1.0 / value;
00199                                 m_sr = sr * 0.001;
00200                                 
00201                                 input_gainer->set_sr(sr);
00202                                 for(i=0; i<5; i++)
00203                                         comb_filter[i]->set_sr(sr);
00204                                 mixer->set_sr(sr);
00205                                 wetdry_xfader->set_sr(sr);
00206                         }
00207                 }
00208 
00209                 // set the vector size (override the inherited method)
00210                 void set_vectorsize(int value)
00211                 {
00212                         short i;
00213                         if(value != vectorsize){
00214                                 vectorsize = value;
00215 
00216                                 input_gainer->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00217                                 for(i=0; i<5; i++)
00218                                         comb_filter[i]->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00219                                 mixer->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00220                                 wetdry_xfader->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00221                 
00222                                 // RESIZE THE TEMP SIGNALS
00223                                 for(i=0; i<k_num_temp_signals; i++)
00224                                         temp[i]->alloc(vectorsize);
00225                         }
00226                 }
00227 };
00228 
00229 
00230 #endif  // TT_FIVECOMB_H
